channel.title: Sqli on PUT CTF blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sqli on PUT CTF blog

item.title: SHA2017 Teaser: Website attack
item.description: Website Attack (200) - 17 solves Our website received an attack in 2013, we managed to capture the attack in this pcap. Can you find out if we leaked some sensitive information? The beginning - Wireshark problem After opening the provided pcap file in Wireshark, we could see that there’s a problem. Besides tcp packets, there were some malformed ones - which under closer inspection turned out to be named GSM over IP.
